# speechRecognizer(_:didRecognizeCommand:)

**Instance Method**

Invoked when the recognition engine has recognized the application command `command`.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func speechRecognizer(_ sender: NSSpeechRecognizer, didRecognizeCommand command: String)
```

## Discussion

`command` is one of the strings from the array passed to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechRecognizer/commands]. The delegate typically evaluates which command was recognized and performs the related action.

## Related Documentation

- **Speech Programming Topics**
